title: Step 1: Initialize project and test foundations
Step 2: Add program JSON schema and loader
description: Create JSON fixture, validation, and ordered loader

title: Step 3: Implement session domain model and reducer
Step 4: Add localStorage persistence and resume prompt
Step 5: Build core mobile session screen
Step 6: Add hold timer and rest timer behaviors
Step 7: Implement skip queue cycle and completion logic
Step 8: Add end-early flow and session summaries
Step 9: Expand Vitest coverage
Step 10: Add Playwright mobile E2E coverage
Step 11: Hardening, accessibility, and final verification
Final verification and loop closure
description: Run full quality gates, document confidence in scratchpad, and close objective loop if all checks pass.

title: Hands-free Step 0: Prettier quality gate
description: Add prettier config/scripts and ensure prettier+lint+unit+e2e baseline passes

title: Hands-free Step 1: Session phase model skeleton
description: Introduce deterministic phase model and start transition

title: Hands-free Step 2: Hold countdown tenths
description: Implement hold countdown in tenths with completion transition

title: Hands-free Step 3: Rep loop + rep rest defaults
description: Auto hold->repRest->hold and default rep rest to 30s

title: Hands-free Step 4: Set progression + set rest
description: Auto set boundaries with independent set rest defaults

title: Hands-free Step 5: Exercise progression + exercise rest
description: Auto exercise boundaries with exercise rest default 30s

title: Hands-free Step 6: Pause/resume exact remaining time
description: Pause and resume preserve exact remaining time across phases

title: Hands-free Step 7: Lifecycle suspend + wake lock
description: Suspend timers on background/lock and request wake lock when supported

title: Hands-free Step 8: Options sound/vibration toggles
description: Add options toggles default-on for sound and vibration cues

title: Hands-free Step 9: Override modal actions
description: Add bottom override button/modal with skip rep/rest/end set/end exercise

title: Hands-free Step 10: UI cleanup + acceptance regression
description: Remove target/active set labels and run full acceptance regression

title: Step 1: pause consistency across timed phases
description: Verify/fix pause freeze + exact resume for hold/rep-rest/set-rest/exercise-rest; add missing unit/e2e coverage and pass all gates.

title: Step 2: rest + control and cue reliability
description: Ensure rest increment control is deterministic and cue dispatch honors settings; expand unit/e2e coverage.

title: Step 3: explicit start and swipe dismiss rest
description: Require explicit start for timed exercise and implement safe/idempotent swipe-to-dismiss rest transitions with tests.

title: Step 4: restart current exercise/set controls
description: Add scoped restart actions and settings affordances for current exercise and current set with tests.

title: Step 5: timed-phase timer visibility invariant
description: Ensure visible countdown exists in every timed phase and enforce with unit/e2e matrix assertions.

title: Step 6: exercise transition animation polish
description: Implement exercise-to-exercise swipe transition and reduced-motion fallback with behavior tests.

title: Step 7: README badges and screenshots
description: Update README with CI badges and current Playwright-captured screenshots.

title: Step 8: final regression + release readiness
description: Run full quality gates, verify >=90% coverage all categories, and close acceptance checklist.
